[ library(m_tree234) | Third Party Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

member(+Tree, ?Key, ?Value)

Succeeds if Key and Value unify with a key/value pair from Tree.
Tree
A 2-3-4 tree
Key
A key from Tree
Value
The value in Tree corresponding to Key

Description

Tries to unify Key and Value with key/value pairs from the tree Tree.

If Key and Value are variables and Tree is a 2-3-4 tree, then all members of the tree Tree are found on backtracking.

This predicate should only be called with trees created by other predicates from the tree234 module.

Fail Conditions

Fails if Key and Value do not unify with a key/value pair from Tree.

Resatisfiable

yes

See Also

search / 3, lookup / 3
